title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: EXARIS Learning for Improving Scientific and Digital Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners systematically analyze environmental issue-related data and derive scientific conclusions using the EXARIS model
Learners enhance digital literacy by creating and sharing digital resources (infographics, information graphics, etc.) via smartphones
Learners complete a project proposing solutions to environmental problems reflecting the inquiry process

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
